items.title: This stock has seen major swings thanks to a challenging housing market. This options trade protects from volatility
items.description: Michael Khouw breaks down a strangle trade on this real estate name.

items.title: The one financial stock Josh Brown likes best here. And Warren Buffett is your copilot
items.description: Josh and Sean review the great results last week from a trio of financials. And reveal who they like the best from the group.

items.title: From fraternities to women's soccer, this under-the-radar T-shirt brand is popping up everywhere
items.description: A loyal and growing base of consumers are driving demand for the half-century-old, Gildan-owned shirt brand Comfort Colors.

items.title: Apple gets upgraded by Loop Capital, which says iPhone adoption is about to take another leg higher
items.description: Apple shares could rally as the smartphone maker plans to release several new products with refreshed design features and AI integrations, Loop Capita...

items.title: Activist investor Jana Partners takes stake in medical device maker Cooper Companies, WSJ says
items.description: The hedge fund will push Cooper to improve how it allocates capital in order to boost returns, the WSJ said.
